nodes.bodyText: I guess JsonFormatWriter is not performance critical, so the extra String allocations here are not a concern.
Exactly, but I want to do a bit more due diligence on this to see if it's worth the drop in code quality.

NPE happens here, for example when DDSpanContext#getSpanType() returns null
compare to : https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-java/pull/1455/files#diff-d27443624dce2e3e0340de2124be31aeR37
addressed, would you be willing to approve please?
